snippet.title: Year Long Alarm - Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Year Long Alarm' will be releasing on Steam on November 16 as a free mod for Half-Life 2: Episode 2. 

The mod take's place in-between the events of Episode 1 and 2, with around 40 minutes of gameplay. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/747250/HalfLife_2_Year_Long_Alarm/

--------------
